skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit decreases the target's Turn Meter by 7.5% if the target is under a [Fear] or a [True Fear]debuff. Reduce the cooldown of this Champion's Taste of Despair [P] skill by 1 turn if this attack kills an enemy.

Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 75% chance of placing a [Fear] debuff for 1 turn and a 75% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns. Has a 75% chance of placing a [True Fear] debuff on 2 enemies for 1 turn if this attack kills an enemy. One [True Fear] debuff will be placed on the enemy with the lowest Turn Meter, while one will be placed on the enemy with the highest Turn Meter.

Attacks 1 enemy. Will ignore 35% of target's DEF if the target is under a [Fear] or a [True Fear]debuff. Places a 30% [Increase SPD] buff for 2 turnes, a [Revive On Death] buff for 2 turns, and a [Block Debuffs] buff for 1 turn on this Champion if this attack kills an enemy.
